title: Week 13 Recap: Playoff picture changes after big NFC upset
itunes:title: Week 13 Recap: Playoff picture changes after big NFC upset
description:
A room filled with some heroes- Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler, Chris Wesseling & Nick Shook- recap all of the Week 13 action, including a big win for the Vikings (3:00); The Pats roll off another victory on the Throne of Ease, but not without a little controversy (19:00); Things are starting to get extremely dark for the Browns, who fell to Philip Rivers and the Chargers (36:00); Jimmy Garoppolo’s 49ers debut was a big success (53:00); and much more!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
